_header: Fele folk in affection / Has Christopher & devocion
Subjects: Christopher, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Christopher in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
fel folk in affeccionehas cristofor &
                    deuocione…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…bot prays hym hartly fore to begud frend til al in
                    necessite
